article_title: Financial Firms Grapple With Cyber Risk in the Supply Chain
article_text: As cyberattackers increasingly try to gain entry into company systems through trusted partners, CISOs now have to worry about the security of partners, suppliers and other providers. Financial services regulators are increasingly focusing on these relationships.

article_summary:
As cyberattackers increasingly try to gain entry into company systems through trusted partners, CISOs now have to worry about the security of partners, suppliers and other providers.
Financial services regulators are increasingly focusing on these relationships.
